text: Hi guyz, I have problem with recyclerview . I am using coordinate layout with viewpager.  And view pager with fragments that contains recyclerview. AppBarLayout is going up even if recyerview has no data or less data that do not require to scroll.

attachments.title: Toolbar in AppBarLayout is scrollable although RecyclerView has not enough content to scroll
attachments.text: Is it really intended that the Toolbar in a AppBarLayout is scrollable although the main container with the "appbar_scrolling_view_behavior" has not enough content to really scroll? What I have te...
attachments.fallback: Toolbar in AppBarLayout is scrollable although RecyclerView has not enough content to scroll
